name: TreaTrees
description:
Hey everyone! Quick intro about me - This is my first published game ever and I am a beginner when it comes to game development. Hope you enjoy the game!

TreaTrees is a game where you have to do some planting and watering in order to control the rising pollution levels in the atmosphere.
You simply walk around in your field in order to water the plants to keep them alive.
Remember, more the pollution, faster the plants rot.
Your goal? Try to stay alive as long as possible!

Controls - WASD/Arrow Keys to move and G to interact. Escape to quit at any time.

Known Bugs - Play Again button makes your character stuck, please relaunch!
